org.fosstrak.webadapters.epcis.rest
Interface IRESTfulEPCISResource

All Known Implementing Classes:
RESTfulEPCIS, RESTfulEPCISBusinessLogic
public interface IRESTfulEPCISResource

Interface for the EPCIS Webadapter business logic

Author:
Mathias Mueller mathias.mueller(at)unifr.ch
